title.rendered: Ecommerce Branding Strategies – Building a REAL Brand on Amazon with Jason Franciosa

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 30:38 — 28.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 30:38 — 28.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

We are still with Jason Franciosa, talking about the effects of being customer-centric instead of just building your business to sell it. Aim for the best experience for loyal customers. To find out more, stay tuned.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to expand website sales
  • How to expand your distributors globally
  • How to deal with Amazon ads
  • How to protect yourself from copycats and from being attacked.
